header.description: Property.  This message contains the definition of an orientation constraint.

orientation.description: Property.  The desired orientation of the robot link specified as a quaternion

link_name.description: Property.  The robot link this constraint refers to

absolute_x_axis_tolerance.description: Property.  Tolerance on the three vector components of the orientation error (optional)

weight.description: Property.  The different options for the orientation error parameterization  - Intrinsic xyz Euler angles (default value)  - A rotation vector. This is similar to the angle-axis representation,  but the magnitude of the vector represents the rotation angle.  A weighting factor for this constraint (denotes relative importance to other constraints. Closer to zero means less important)
